EmailTemplate.name: 18-Bus @ Cloud Spd-Peering Engineering-Email-APRICOTEmailers-T003LW.Email - Save
EmailTemplate.subject: Make insight-driven IP real. Join Nokia at APRICOT.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Save the date! Join Nokia at APRICOT Making insight-driven IP real Join us at APRICOT from February 18th to 28th Visit us at our booth # 9 in Hall 109 & 110 at APRICOT <[[https://2019.apricot.net/]]> to meet our technical experts and see our demos of automated peering engineering and insight-driven DDoS mitigation. Hear our experts present on Segment Routing for DCI <[[https://2019.apricot.net/program/presentations/#segment-routing-for-dci]]>, Internet Traffic 2009-2019 <[[https://2019.apricot.net/program/presentations/#internet-traffic-2009-2019]]> and 5G technology <[[https://2019.apricot.net/program/presentations/#5-g-technology-a-tutorial]]>. Find out how we can help you implement high performance IP networks that are massively scalable, highly automated and secure while also being cost efficient. View the event page: APRICOT 2019 <[[https://2019.apricot.net/]]> Â© {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
Nokia: Karaportti 3, 2610 Espoo, Finland Contact Us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Twitter}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Linkedin}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Facebook}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Youtube}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Blog}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia Networks or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
